mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(cct.ct_idx) FROM cp_crew_together cct JOIN cp_camping_crew ccc on ccc.ct_idx = cct.ct_idx JOIN cp_camping cc ON cc.ca_idx = cct.ca_idx WHERE ccc.mb_id = #{loginId} AND cct.ct_idx not in (SELECT bb_relation_idx from cp_board_blind WHERE bb_relation = 'cp_crew_together') ORDER BY cct.ct_idx DESC;

SELECT cct.ct_idx, cc.ca_name, cct.ct_wish_start, cct.ct_wish_end, ccc.cc_crew, ccc.cc_is_join, cct.ct_end, (select count(cr_idx) from cp_camping_review ccr where mb_id = #{loginId} and ct_idx = cct.ct_idx) as cntCR, (select count(mr_idx) from cp_member_review cmr where mr_id = #{loginId} and ct_idx = cct.ct_idx) as cntMR FROM cp_crew_together cct JOIN cp_camping_crew ccc on ccc.ct_idx = cct.ct_idx JOIN cp_camping cc ON cc.ca_idx = cct.ca_idx WHERE ccc.mb_id = #{loginId} AND cct.ct_idx not in (SELECT bb_relation_idx from cp_board_blind WHERE bb_relation = 'cp_crew_together') ORDER BY cct.ct_idx DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{skip}
SELECT cm.mb_nickname, ccc.mb_id, ccc.ct_idx FROM cp_camping_crew ccc, cp_member cm WHERE ct_idx = #{param1} AND ccc.mb_id = cm.mb_id
mapper.update: UPDATE cp_camping_crew SET cc_is_join = 1 where mb_id = #{param1} AND ct_idx = #{param2}
UPDATE cp_crew_together SET ct_end = 1, ct_end_datetime = now() WHERE ct_idx = #{param1}
